Some excel at coding, others at creative writing, and others at visual tasks. A model router automatically selects the best model for each task."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"The Problem"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"Using a single model for all tasks is inefficient:"}],"\n",["$","ul",null,{"className":"list-disc list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"GPT-4 is expensive for simple tasks"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Claude excels at coding but may be overkill for simple questions"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Vision models are needed for image analysis"}],"\n",["$","li","li-3",{"children":"Fast models are better for quick responses"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Solution: Task-Based Routing"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"A smart router analyzes the input and routes it to the most appropriate model based on task type, cost, and performance requirements."}],"\n",["$","h3",null,{"className":"text-xl font-bold text-white mt-6 mb-3","children":"Architecture Overview"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"The router consists of three main components:"}],"\n",["$","ol",null,{"className":"list-decimal list-inside text-gray-300 mb-4 space-y-2","children":["\n",["$","li","li-0",{"children":"Task Classifier - Identifies the type of task"}],"\n",["$","li","li-1",{"children":"Model Selector - Chooses the best model for the task"}],"\n",["$","li","li-2",{"children":"Execution Engine - Runs the task and returns results"}],"\n"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Task Classification"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"The router needs to classify tasks automatically using pattern matching and heuristics:"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":[["$","strong","strong-0",{"children":"Code Tasks"}],": Look for programming keywords, syntax patterns\n",["$","strong","strong-1",{"children":"Vision Tasks"}],": Detect image-related requests\n",["$","strong","strong-2",{"children":"Simple Q&A"}],": Short questions with clear intent\n",["$","strong","strong-3",{"children":"Complex Reasoning"}],": Long-form analysis requests"]}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Cost Optimization"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"By routing tasks appropriately, you can reduce costs by up to 70%. Simple questions go to fast, cheap models while complex tasks use premium models."}],"\n",["$","h2",null,{"className":"text-2xl font-bold text-white mt-8 mb-4","children":"Conclusion"}],"\n",["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-300 mb-4 leading-relaxed","children":"A smart model router can dramatically reduce costs while maintaining or improving quality by using the right tool for each
